thread.title: Pay attention to this one trading rule when it comes to Nvidia shares, market watcher says

author: Keris Lahiff
title: Pay attention to this one trading rule when it comes to Nvidia shares, market watcher says
text: Pay attention to this one trading rule when it comes to Nvidia shares, market watcher says Keris Lahiff Reblog Nvidia NVDA is setting records ahead of its Thursday afternoon earnings report. One market watcher says it's a sign of what's to come. "There's an old trading rule: When a stock makes all-time highs, pay attention," Boris Schlossberg , managing director of FX strategy at BK Asset Management, told CNBC's " Trading Nation " on Wednesday.
